evidence.claim: Ceras Health utilizes AWS cloud services for its infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance for its health technology solutions.
Ceras Health supports integration through FHIR for health data exchange.
X12 transaction sets are used for interoperability with EHR systems.
Ceras Health employs REST APIs for external system communication.

icp.icp_reason: Ceras Health uses X12 transactions for claims and eligibility processing.
